title: Return of the ATN Mailbag, Carson Wentz in the MVP convo & a potential Steelers trade?
itunes:title: Return of the ATN Mailbag, Carson Wentz in the MVP convo & a potential Steelers trade?
description:
A room filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Colleen Wolfe & Gregg Rosenthal recap Monday night's showdown between the Eagles and Redskins, including Carson Wentz's masterful escape (3:00); Steelers coach Mike Tomlin's response to the Martavis Bryant trade rumblings (13:30); Looking ahead to Thursday night's matchup between the Ravens and Dolphins, and whether or not it's a must-win for Baltimore (24:30); And the return of a listener favorite- the ATN Mailbag! (33:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
